snippet.textDisplay:
few years back, a friend from Hyderabad told me "Tagore was basically a Song Writer-Comoposer, he deserved Grammy or Oscar, not the Noble,". That moment i din' t argue.
This tribute from Rahman Sir is the ultimate answer, that Rabindra Nath Tagore was more than a Noble, that evn after 100 years he is able to inspire an Oscar winner to Produce n Compose for Him :))

snippet.textDisplay: Tagore words were not being rapped. It is used as prelude. I am strongly against of alteration of Tagore's creation but adding something new can be appreciated.
snippet.textOriginal: Tagore words were not being rapped. It is used as prelude. I am strongly against of alteration of Tagore's creation but adding something new can be appreciated.

snippet.textDisplay:
It is a creation, not an alteration of creation. There should not be any negative criticism since a well paid respect is given by not altering Tagore's any song.

Tagore's writing has brought different meaning to different people. Sometimes original sense is lost cause that writing stirred many hearts with different sense. This poem can be feasible with this theme.

A musician adds music to words, not altering old tune with new flavors. 

Much appreciated. Waiting for more. Cheers.
snippet.textOriginal:
It is a creation, not an alteration of creation. There should not be any negative criticism since a well paid respect is given by not altering Tagore's any song.

Tagore's writing has brought different meaning to different people. Sometimes original sense is lost cause that writing stirred many hearts with different sense. This poem can be feasible with this theme.

A musician adds music to words, not altering old tune with new flavors. 

Much appreciated. Waiting for more. Cheers.

snippet.textDisplay: Bastardize? What kind of language is that??? If you can't take it, stick to the Sarengi & Harmonium and deify Tagore in your home. Bengalis like you are best at criticizing others but would never try something like this yourself. Your "true criticism" is because you can't tolerate anyone revitalizing Tagore. It's an old habit of Bengalis to incinerate anyone who does so, right from Debabrata Biswas to Neel Dutt who tried to infuse some life & modernization to his notations & music arrangements.
snippet.textOriginal: Bastardize? What kind of language is that??? If you can't take it, stick to the Sarengi & Harmonium and deify Tagore in your home. Bengalis like you are best at criticizing others but would never try something like this yourself. Your "true criticism" is because you can't tolerate anyone revitalizing Tagore. It's an old habit of Bengalis to incinerate anyone who does so, right from Debabrata Biswas to Neel Dutt who tried to infuse some life & modernization to his notations & music arrangements.

snippet.textDisplay:
We all know who Tagore was. One of the greatest poets of all times. Started writing poems since he was eight years old.
But I had never heard this poem before and I regret having not heard it much before. And I have to appreciate ARR for bringing this poem into the limelight. Not sure if this composition could have created as much of an impact in an other way.
snippet.textOriginal:
We all know who Tagore was. One of the greatest poets of all times. Started writing poems since he was eight years old.
But I had never heard this poem before and I regret having not heard it much before. And I have to appreciate ARR for bringing this poem into the limelight. Not sure if this composition could have created as much of an impact in an other way.
